thread.title: Portronics Clamp universal car mount phone holder launched for Rs 199
thread.title_full: Portronics Clamp universal car mount phone holder launched for Rs 199

title: Portronics Clamp universal car mount phone holder launched for Rs 199
text:
Portronics Clamp universal car mount phone holder launched for Rs 199 Portronics Clamp universal car mount phone holder launched for Rs 199 By March 24, 2017 “The Clamp features a 360-degree hinge and can be mounted either horizontally or vertically” 
Smartphone accessory giant Portronics has added yet another product to its portfolio in the form of a universal phone car mount dubbed the Clamp. The Portronics Clamp sports a push-fit design, allowing it to be attached either vertically or horizontally to any air vent by rotating the clip at the back. The Clamp features a spring loaded arm which can be pulled back to fit any smartphone with a display less than 6-inches. A soft cushion has been provided inside the holding mount as well which ensures no damage is done to any smartphone. The Clamp features a 360-degree hinge which increases visibility from different angles. The Portronics Clamp is available in four different hues of r ed, black, white and yellow and can be picked up from leading online and offline stores for Rs 199. Facebook Comments
